Package com.intellij.openapi.editor.markup

Interface ActiveGutterRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LineMarkerRenderer, SimpleAccessible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoverageLineMarkerRenderer

    public interface ActiveGutterRenderer
extends LineMarkerRenderer, SimpleAccessible
    Interface which should be implemented in order to paint custom markers in the line marker area (over the folding area) and process mouse events on the markers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.awt.Rectangle calcBounds(Editor editor, int lineNum, java.awt.Rectangle preferredBounds)
      Calculates the rectangular bounds enclosing the marker.

      Processes a mouse released event on the marker.
      default java.lang.String getAccessibleName()
      Returns a human-readable string that designates the purpose of the object.
      default java.lang.String getAccessibleTooltipText()
      Returns the tooltip text or null when the tooltip is not available
      default java.lang.String getTooltipText()
      Returns the text of the tooltip displayed when the mouse is over the renderer area.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.intellij.openapi.editor.markup.LineMarkerRenderer

        paint

    • Method Detail

      • getTooltipText

        default java.lang.String getTooltipText()
        Returns the text of the tooltip displayed when the mouse is over the renderer area.
        Returns:
        the tooltip text, or null if no tooltip is required.

      • doAction

        void doAction(Editor editor,
              java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Processes a mouse released event on the marker.

        Implementations must extend one of canDoAction(com.intellij.openapi.editor.Editor, java.awt.event.MouseEvent) methods, otherwise the action will never be called.

        Parameters:
        editor - the editor to which the marker belongs.
        e - the mouse event instance.

      • canDoAction

        default boolean canDoAction(Editor editor,
                            java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Returns:
        true if doAction(Editor, MouseEvent) should be called

      • canDoAction

        default boolean canDoAction(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)

      • calcBounds

        default java.awt.Rectangle calcBounds(Editor editor,
                                      int lineNum,
                                      java.awt.Rectangle preferredBounds)
        Calculates the rectangular bounds enclosing the marker. Returns null if the marker is not rendered for the provided line.
        Parameters:
        editor - the editor the renderer belongs to
        lineNum - the line which the marker should intersect
        preferredBounds - the preferred bounds to take into account
        Returns:
        the new calculated bounds or the preferred bounds or null
